column5: My place is close to downtown Brenham with easy access to Hwy 290. This antique victorian was built in 1897. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the high ceilings/ceiling fans, central air/heat and new laminate wood flooring throughout. Bath has been updated with new tile. You will find comfortable queen beds/new linens. This is a SMOKE-FREE home. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, ladies weekend adventures. Local TV.  The nightly price includes all taxes!
column8: Antique Victorian House updated w/extra parking
